item.title: Bored of searching
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:7, topic:377001”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=472917.msg3458591#msg3458591 date=1294266517]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=472917.msg3458576#msg3458576 date=1294265408]

I would suggest paying for it now as you will get a discounted price
[/quote]And later have to buy it again…
[/quote]I don’t think you need to buy it again, do you?

“We will also change the license to remove the line that promises all future versions of the game for free. Please note that this change only affects people who buy the game after December 20, so if you got the game for during alpha, you will still get all future updates for free, despite this change. A promise is a promise.
Buying the game during beta will include all updates up until release, of course, and bug patches will be free.”[/quote]

woot woot i got during alpha

Read full topic

item.title: Bored of searching
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:377001”][quote author=Lin link=topic=472917.msg3458576#msg3458576 date=1294265408]

[quote author=cane link=topic=472917.msg3458448#msg3458448 date=1294257996]
I would suggest paying for it now as you will get a discounted price
[/quote]And later have to buy it again…
[/quote]I don’t think you need to buy it again, do you?[/quote]

“We will also change the license to remove the line that promises all future versions of the game for free. Please note that this change only affects people who buy the game after December 20, so if you got the game for during alpha, you will still get all future updates for free, despite this change. A promise is a promise.
Buying the game during beta will include all updates up until release, of course, and bug patches will be free.”

Read full topic
